title: 📊 Market Intel — Sun Feb 15, 2026 @ 4:00 PM ET
content:
# 📊 Market Intel — Sun Feb 15, 2026 @ 4:00 PM ET

**Top Stories: Bitcoin claws back to $70K after $8.7B wipeout | Patriots lose Super Bowl LX | Truth Social files crypto ETFs | Ethereum Foundation shake-up | Gold hits $5,029**

---

## 🔥 Top Trending

- **Bitcoin recovers to ~$70,000** after an $8.7 billion liquidation wipeout earlier this week, boosted by cooling inflation data
- **Super Bowl LX aftermath** — Patriots lost; Derek Carr says he'd unretire for a shot at winning one
- **Truth Social (Trump-linked) seeks SEC approval** for two crypto ETFs — a BTC/ETH fund and a staking-focused Cronos fund
- **Gold surges to $5,029/oz** — new highs as safe-haven demand continues
- **Ethereum Foundation leadership shake-up** — Tomasz Stańczak out as co-executive director

---

## 📈 Stock Movers

- **S&P 500:** 6,836.17 (+0.05%) — flat into long weekend
- **Dow Jones:** 49,500.93 (+0.10%) — holding near 49.5K
- **Nasdaq:** 22,546.67 (-0.22%) — slight tech weakness
- **Nikkei 225:** 56,941.97 (-1.21%) — notable Japan selloff
- **FTSE 100:** 10,446.35 (+0.42%) — UK outperforming
- **Coinbase:** Analysts slashed price targets after Q4 miss, but shares rallied anyway (Barclays, JPMorgan, Benchmark all cut)
- **Ark Invest:** Bought $18M in crypto stocks, 10th consecutive Bullish purchase
- **WSB Earnings Watch (2/16-2/20):** Thread is pinned and active — big earnings week ahead

---

## 💰 Crypto & Digital Assets

- **BTC:** ~$70,000 — clawed back after massive $8.7B liquidation event; cooling CPI helped
- **XRP:** Outrunning BTC and ETH — investors piled into the recent crash dip
- **UNI (Uniswap):** +5.4%, leading CoinDesk 20 index higher
- **BCH (Bitcoin Cash):** +5.3%, strong recovery
- **BlackRock's digital assets head warns:** Leverage-driven volatility on derivatives platforms threatens bitcoin's institutional narrative
- **Wall Street vs offshore:** CME futures basis higher than Deribit — Wall Street remains bullish while offshore traders retreat
- **Stablecoin battle:** Crypto lobby counters Wall Street bankers who demanded total ban on stablecoin yield at White House meeting
- **Hong Kong** building up crypto regulatory framework
- **Ethereum Foundation** leadership instability continues post-Miyaguchi era
- **Market mood:** "Investors ignore good news, look for exit ramp" — cautious sentiment despite positive catalysts

---

## 🚀 Tesla / SpaceX / Elon

- No major breaking news today (Sunday)
- Truth Social crypto ETF filing keeps Trump/MAGA-adjacent finance in spotlight
- DOGE/government efficiency news quiet over weekend

---

## 💻 Hacker News / Tech

- **"I Fixed Windows Native Development"** — 543 points, 273 comments (huge HN engagement)
- **LT6502: 6502-based homebrew laptop** — 194 points, nostalgia-driven hardware project trending
- **EU bans destruction of unsold apparel** — 494 points, 347 comments (major regulatory news)
- **"Towards Autonomous Mathematics Research"** (arxiv) — AI doing math research, 44 points
- **Gwtar: Static efficient single-file HTML format** by Gwern — 121 points
- **Modern CSS Code Snippets** — "Stop writing CSS like it's 2015" trending
- **VOOG: Moog-style synth in Python** — Show HN, early traction

---

## 🦍 Reddit / WSB

- **Weekly Earnings Thread 2/16-2/20** pinned — 175 upvotes, 232 comments. Big week ahead
- **"What Are Your Moves Tomorrow"** daily thread active for Sunday
- **r/stocks:** Rate My Portfolio quarterly thread still pinned; relatively quiet Sunday
- Weekend mode = lighter volume, but earnings anticipation building
- No single meme stock dominating today — eyes on next week's earnings

---

## 🏈 Sports & Betting

- **Super Bowl LX just happened** — Patriots lost (opponent won)
- **Derek Carr:** Says he'd unretire but only for a chance to win a Super Bowl
- **Raiders:** Promoting assistant Rob Leonard to DC (Maxx Crosby's position coach)
- **Seahawks:** Hiring ex-Ravens staff (offseason moves heating up)
- **NFL wins grievance** regarding NFLPA report cards
- **NCAA Basketball:** Live games ongoing (men's and women's)
- **FA Cup:** Fourth round matches today
- **Winter Olympics (Milan-Cortina):** Coverage ramping up on ESPN

---

## 💎 Commodities & Macro

- **Gold:** $5,029.20/oz (+0.14%) — monster level, safe haven bid strong
- **Copper:** $1,211.50 (+0.43%) — industrial demand steady
- **Brent Crude:** $67.73 (-0.03%) — essentially flat, low $60s-70s range
- **Soybeans:** $1,134.75 (+0.15%)
- **US 10Y Yield:** 4.048% (-0.008) — slight easing
- **EUR/USD:** 1.1870 — dollar weakening
- **GBP/USD:** 1.3648
- **Nikkei down 1.2%** — yen strength / risk-off in Asia
- **Inflation cooling** — helped risk assets recover (BTC bounce)

---

## 🌍 What X Is Talking About

- Super Bowl LX postgame reactions dominating social
- Truth Social crypto ETF filing generating buzz in fintwit
- Bitcoin $70K recovery — "buy the dip" crowd celebrating
- BlackRock leverage warning sparking debate
- Derek Carr unretirement talk going viral in sports Twitter
- EU apparel destruction ban getting traction in sustainability circles

---

*Sources: Reuters, CoinDesk, Reddit (r/wallstreetbets, r/stocks), Hacker News, ESPN, MarketWatch*
*Generated: Sun Feb 15, 2026 @ 4:00 PM ET*
